alert.note: Alert for Armstrong; Carson; Donley; Gray (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 10 at 6:55PM CDT until May 10 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Armstrong County in the Panhandle of Texas... Carson County in the Panhandle of Texas... Western Gray County in the Panhandle of Texas... Northwestern Donley County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 745 PM CDT. * At 655 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles north of Goodnight, or 9 miles east of Claude, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Panhandle, Claude, White Deer, Groom, Skellytown, Lake Mcclellan and Goodnight. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
